string.text:
Mexaminum radiation protection drugs are common in the Zone. When used, this drug induces contraction of peripheral blood vessels and oxygen deprivation, which serve to treat and prevent radiation exposure. The drug does not have severe side effects, although isolated cases of mild nausea, dizziness, cramps and stomach pain have been reported.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast usage (syringe)
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] strong side effects

A normal elastic bandage used to stop bleeding and prevent infection of wounds. For regular bleeding, carefully apply the bandage to the wound. For arterial bleeding, urgently tie the bandage around the affected area.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] first-aid item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast usage (adhesive plaster)

The Russian-made BPOs 10x42 binoculars (the letter S in the title indicates the presence of a rangefinder grid) is suitable for observing distant areas during travelling and hunting. The binoculars are produced by the Kazan Optical-Mechanical Plant, and, based on the standard Porro prism system, provide good resolution within the entire field of view. The imaging of the binoculars is bright and clean without distortion and with preservation of natural colors.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military item

A roll of fresh bread of average quality. It mainly enters the Zone through the military, who happily exchange provisions for loot and supplies. It is a rare delicacy in the Zone, like any other qualitative food.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] food
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] clean nutrition source

An old piece of bread that has long since dried. It is partially covered by mold. Consumption is difficult but possible.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food

100-pages worth of prime nude Russian girls. Probably the best way to travel to a better place, at least mentally. Westerners often joke about it saying “From Russia with love,” whereas practiced Zoners say it’s hot indeed when put in a stove.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon lubrication and cleaning (+2%)

A joint calms you and lets you relax for a little while. Via a distinct sedative effect, it briefly “disconnects” and “restarts” the brain, allowing it to stay in healthy condition and avoid irreversible damaging consequences.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]NOTE:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Smoking helps to stabilize your mental condition after any psionic attacks.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] stimulant
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] strong alleviation against psy-damage

Cigarettes imported from the West. By the looks of it, someone has already consumed a part of the pack; not a surprise, considering their rarity in the Zone.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]NOTE:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Smoking helps to stabilize your mental condition after any psionic attacks.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] stimulant
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] average alleviation against psy-damage
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] damages health

A mini-textbook published by the Armed Forces of Ukraine for survival in extreme situations. Contains content useful to all newcomers to the Zone.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon lubrication and cleaning (+3%)

This bar provides the body with necessary proteins and sugars which give you a welcome boost. Useful on longer trips when you’re on the go and need to eat something fast. Such chocolate bars are, however, very rare in the Zone.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] food
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] clean nutrition source

A syringe filled with a substance of unknown contents. The print on the surface indicates recommended use only when faced with life-threatening wounds.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast usage (syringe)

The best before date at the back of the tin can indicates that you shouldn’t expect delicacies.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] food
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] clean nutrition source

Tushonkas are known for their high nutrition value (mostly owing to high fat content) and a relatively good taste. The Chernobyl Exclusion Zone has seen hundreds of types and tastes of tushonkas. In the spring of 2013, “Abakan” minced-meat brand remains the unquestionable king, and certainly the Zone has seen worse than that.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] food
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] clean nutrition source

A well-roasted rat carcass with a crispy crust; the baseline of a novice stalker’s diet. Appears appetizing, though its taste is like rubber. It is a good choice in conditions of deficiency so as not to die of hunger.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food

2 small skewered tushkanos, grilled and seasoned with salt and chili pepper. The cheapest hot meal available in the Zone. Wrapped in thick brown paper to prevent the fat from dripping.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food

A small hot meal of grilled dog chops mixed with garlic, peppers and mushrooms. Served in an old tin box. A cheap alternative to the more popular boar chops.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food

A portion of grilled pseudodog meat chops. Good nutrition value due to the thick muscles of the animal.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food

2 slices of fat and greasy bacon made from mutated pigs commonly known as flesh. Wrapped in thick brown paper to prevent the fat from dripping.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food

>A small portion of boar meat, grilled and seasoned with salt and mixed with peppers. The most popular warm meal among stalkers. Wrapped in brown paper.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food

A small hot meal made from bloodsucker meat spiced with chilies and mixed with mushrooms. Served in a tin box.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food

Grilled snork hand. Imagining any type of worse food is difficult. It is also worth noting that eating snorks is a true sign of cannibalism.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food

A portion of grilled chimera meat, served with mushrooms and spices. An expensive meal, eaten most commonly by veteran stalkers to celebrate accomplishment of difficult missions.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food

A very simple home-made device. It was assembled from the most common parts by skilled craftsmen among the stalker community, most of which are available in any radio receiver. Powered by a built-in battery. Reacts to the presence of artifacts with distinct sounds. Unfortunately, any chance of picking up frequencies from radio stations in the Zone has been lost.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] does not require UPD

This dated anomalous activity detector produces an alarm signal when anomalous particles enter a special chamber as you approach an anomaly. It can also register the presence of artifacts and measure the distance to the nearest one. The distance is indicated by the frequency of the sound the detector emits. To switch to artifact search mode, open the device’s front cover. Due to its simple design, Echo can only be used to locate the most common artifacts.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] low UPD consumption

A next generation scientific detection scanner. Thanks to three modernized detection chambers, the position of artifacts is shown on a special display screen. When closed, the device registers only radiation and anomalies. To switch to artifact search mode, open the front LED display. When in search mode, the detector is capable of locating all artifacts known to science.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] high UPD consumption

A prototype of an expanded functionality anomalous frequency scanner. This device comes with a program used to identify static areas of anomalous activity stored in its database, while retaining the ability to locate artifacts. The position of anomalous areas and artifacts is displayed on a special screen. The artifact search mode, which can be activated by opening the front LED display, has been modified to detect anomalous formations currently unknown to science. With a little luck, you can also salvage the batteries powering the device.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] high UPD consumption

A standard head-mounted flashlight in fully working order. Useful for stalkers who find themselves out and about after dark, but may attract trouble if used unwisely.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] moderate UPD consumption

The IP2 antitoxin is a complex drug comprising several antidotes, including metoclopramidum, pyridoxine, thiamine, riboxin and other pharmaceuticals. The drug is used to inject a range of antibiotics to neutralize natural poisons, together with synthetic poison absorbers, into the bloodstream. IP2 is not particularly popular in the Zone as most stalkers rely on a gas mask and a protective suit. However, there are still those who have a few units of this antidote stashed for emergency situations. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] eliminates toxins in the body
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] slight side effects

Tablets containing a complex of the most necessary vitamins for a human being, primarily to maintain immunity. When consuming the meat of mutants, it is strongly recommended to take a tablet after each meal.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] prolonged body recovery time

A drug that blocks avalanche-like nerve impulses. Consumption induces short-term loss of all emotion. Used exclusively in the Zone to counteract the effects of anomalous psy-fields. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] slight side effects
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] slight sleepiness increase

Sparkling water for thirsty stalkers. It has an exhilarating effect when you’re tired.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] drink
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mild alcohol sobering effect
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon maintenance (+1%)

“The Beak” is a powerful mixture of Zone-produced vodka and the pulverized beak of a black crow. The rumour has it that such beaks contain a form of enriched protein that cleanses moderate amounts of radiation from the body. Some even say that drinking “the Beak” gives you the feeling of possessing wings for a few seconds. On the downside, however, the taste itself is awful.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] drink
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] stimulant
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] strong, low quality alcohol
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] slight sleepiness decrease

Often used by stalkers on long trips due to its exhilarating effect when you’re tired. The drink also sobers you up a bit if you’re drunk as well as induces the release of adrenaline into the bloodstream. To avoid an overdose, it is recommended not to abuse drinking.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] drink
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] stimulant
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] significant sleepiness decrease

Guitar is a string instrument widely used by stalkers of all factions throughout the Zone in order to raise spirits and fraternize. Stalkers can often be seen playing the guitar in camps, outposts or other places of relative safety - usually by the fire.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item

A package containing a meal of old bread and some smelly meat of unknown origin wrapped in brown paper. The look and smell suggest that some of it is mouldy.
 
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] low quality

A standard single-use medical kit. Handy for treating injuries, wounds, chemical and thermal burns and various types of poisoning.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] slow usage (field kit)
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] slight side effects

A specialized medical kit for providing first aid to combat casualties. The kit includes blood coagulants based on menadione, painkillers, antibiotics and immunostimulants, as well as a kit for removing bullets and fragments from the body. This medkit is issued primarily to army personnel such as Spetsnaz units venturing deep into the Zone and is popular among Duty forces.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] slow usage (field kit)
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] slight side effects

A specialized medical kit for providing first aid to combat casualties. The kit includes blood coagulants based on menadione, painkillers, antibiotics and immunostimulants, as well as a kit for removing bullets and fragments from the body. This medkit is issued primarily to army personnel such as Spetsnaz units venturing deep into the Zone and is popular among Duty forces.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] slow usage (field kit)
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] eliminates toxins in the body
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] no side effects

Glucose shots are used in cases of severe diabetic hypoglycemia, but can also be employed as a stimulant. Instant induction of carbohydrates entails a rapid boost of energy, thus allowing the user to undertake increased physical effort and withstand stress.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] stimulant
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast usage (syringe)
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] slight sleepiness decrease

Glucose shots are used in cases of severe diabetic hypoglycemia, but can also be employed as a stimulant. Instant induction of carbohydrates entails a rapid boost of energy, thus allowing the user to undertake increased physical effort and withstand stress. Contains a large dose of the drug.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] stimulant
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast usage (syringe)
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] moderate sleepiness decrease

Improvised stimpacks are popular among novice Zoners as they are easy to obtain and inexpensive; though their strong side effects, which affect many users, are nothing to scoff at. Produced in the Zone from commonly available ingredients, without proper equipment and purification. Injected in the thigh.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast, easy usage (syringe)
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] moderate body recovery time

Military stims constitute a part of standard-issue soldier equipment for field operations in the Zone. Easily available on the market and can be acquired for a moderate price. Popular among experienced Zoners. They are significantly more potent and faster working than their improvised counterparts, which makes them perfect for use in life-threatening situations.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast usage (syringe)
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast body recovery time

It is produced by the same chemical department, which developed the famous SEVA suit. This stimpack is the most powerful health stabilizer available in the Zone. The best and highest quality ingredients, as well as the improved formula, allow to restore health almost instantly, neutralize all the toxins accumulated in the body, and reduce the feeling of hunger. There are no side effects. It is very expensive, hence only few very lucky stalkers got to use it.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] high value
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast usage (syringe)
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast body recovery time
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] eliminates toxins in the body
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] high health improvement

A small package of activated carbon which can absorb all sorts of toxins, gases, salts and heavy metals. Recommended to use after eating harmful food, strong medicine or alcohol.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] eliminates toxins in the body
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] health improvement

A common sight among all stalkers. Contains digital logs and maps of zones, places and anomalies, if you give it to the right trader it’s worth a good amount of money
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] low UPD consumption

Popular among everyone in the Zone. It goes down well and removes the effects of radiation. Shouldn’t be abused however tempting it might be.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] drink
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] stimulant
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] strong alcohol
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon maintenance (+3%)

A last generation anomaly detector. Equipped with a locator of abnormal formations and LED displays for showing the path to the artifact. Other than that it can also show the distance to the artifact. To initiate the artifact search mode, raise the antenna on the front side of the device. Since its the last generation, it has a somewhat outdated list of artifacts.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] average energy consumption

An experimental drug developed by Professor Ozersky for scientific research teams working in the Zone. At its core, the drug contains tetrodotoxin, known colloquially as “zombie powder,” which causes a complete shutdown of the body’s central nervous system that may allow people to survive emissions outside cover. The drug has not undergone clinical or field testing, which puts its effectiveness in doubt and raises the issue of possible side effects.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] causes temporary blackout
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] average sleepiness increase
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] strong side effects

The main component of this product is an anabolic androgen, an artificial steroid, the chemical composition of which resembles testosterone. Often used by stalkers during long raids to reduce muscle fatigue. Significantly increases weight-carrying capacity. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] drink
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] stimulant
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] slight sleepiness decrease

B190 Indraline radioprotectant, included in medkits issued to nuclear power plant personnel. Used in the Zone instead of the excessively toxic PC1 cysteamine hydrochloride, repeated use of which often caused death. Reduces the effects of gamma radiation on live tissue. Best consumed before exposure, as effects are not instant, but the drug lasts a long time. Take one capsule at a time.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] slight side effects

For blues and prison romance lovers.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item

This machine gunfighting system is a portable device with a complex system of two-stage delivery of cartridges directly from the backpack to the weapon with a use of a flexible sleeve. Despite its weight and low accuracy, this weapon found its admirers in the Zone. It is used mainly to fight superior enemy forces in faction wars and cleansing mutant lairs.

A kerosene lamp. Not very practical to travel with due to its large size. Nonetheless, it serves as a good light source in a camp.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] does not require seasoning

An already used set of batteries, designed for flashlights and PDA’s amongst other electronic devices, don’t forget to replace these constantly.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] çàðÿäêà +52%

Beard’s popular hot tea made from a mixture of sugar, edible dried mushrooms and boiled water that is said to be radiation-free. Stalkers who can afford to buy the drink often take it for long trips in the Zone. It’s a good and healthy way to stay on your toes when you’re getting tired or when you’re out exploring on cold nights.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] drink
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] stimulant
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] potent alcohol sobering effect
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] moderate sleepiness decrease

Simple cloth sheet, commonly used both to patch clothing and spread oils and cleaning solvents onto firearm mechanisms. Can be applied by any needle or glue.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] outfit repair, weapon maintenance (+3%)

Sheet of military-grade textile that can be used for field repairs of clothing and light armor. Valued for its relatively low price and high versatility, this material is commonly used by the Zoners. Medium-grade sewing equipment and advanced glue required for use. It can also be used to improve spread of liquids during weapon maintenance.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military item
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] outfit repair, weapon maintenance (+4%)

Thick textile patch reinforced with kevlar padding. Can be used to repair medium and heavy armors. Large enough to cover multiple damaged areas. High quality sewing kits and adhesives are required to make use of it. Its alternative usage is weapon lubrication and cleaning - due to increased hardness it’s able reach even less accessible areas of firearm parts.
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military item
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] outfit repair, weapon maintenance (+6%)

Steel wool, also known as wire wool or wire sponge, is a bundle of strands of very fine soft steel filaments. It is used as an abrasive in finishing and repair work for polishing wood or metal objects, cleaning household cookware, and sanding in light painting. Steel wool is made from low-carbon steel (carbon content is low enough to be close to plain iron). It is not made by drawing “steel wool wire” through a tapered die, but rather by a process more like broaching where a heavy steel wire is pulled through a toothed die that removes a thin wire shaving. Bundles of steel wool can be used in precision equipment cleaning and to improve spreading of lubricants and cleaning solvents.

%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] weapon maintenance (+6%)

Grease is a semisolid lubricant. It generally consists of a soap emulsified with mineral or vegetable oil. Greases are applied to mechanisms that cannot be lubricated constantly or where typical lubricating oil would not stay in position. They also act as sealants to prevent ingress of water and incompressible materials. Grease-lubricated bearings have greater frictional characteristics due to their high viscosity.

%c[0,170,170,170]This kit contains everything that is needed to perform effective repair of modern combat helmets. It features heavy tools that will allow you to work on hard materials such as kevlar, steel or titanium, as well as a very strong, methacrylate-based adhesive. As the kit does not contain any sewing equipment, it cannot be effectively utilized for reparation of flexible materials of armors, but it can be used to disassemble headgear sets to greatly improve the effectiveness of repair.

Trade in the Zone is conducted mainly by means of electronic transactions for safety and managing reasons. But many stalkers keep at least a few coins in their pockets in case they want to buy smaller things like cigarettes. This makes life easier and conserves battery life.

Military flasks are intended for storing small amounts of water. Prepared by medics and scientists. First, the water - combined with a special type of alcohol - is boiled at a very high temperature for purification and disinfection. Afterwards, it is cooled in refrigerators, to which it owes its refreshing “spark.” The end result is water that is completely radiation-free. If in spite of the above, you still have doubts concerning its purity, you can always use akvatab. Due to the cost of production, military flasks are in a limited supply and are sold at a moderate price. Medics also have them in stock, but they’re slightly more expensive as they include the cost of transportation.

This notebook describes various drug deals in detail. Specific nicknames, locations and time of meets. Some deals are executed through equipment exchanges and others are paid in large amounts of rubles. When browsing the pages, it becomes clear that Freedom is the main distributor of natural drugs such as marijuana. Bandits are producers and distributors of the more powerful (and dangerous) synthetic drugs like salicylic acid and cocaine. Apparently, every faction in the Zone takes part in these deals. In particular, Monolith seems to be taking in large amounts drugs in exchange for more expensive types of ammunition and equipment.

An old, yellow newspaper. Seems to be issued a month ago, if not more. Reading newspapers, playing cards, reading books, playing guitar or harmonica are the most common ways to relax and spend time in the Zone. You can find many interesting articles and topics, the newspaper allows you to stay tuned of what is happening outside the Zone. Not to mention that it can be always used to wrap meat and food around.

An old-school and very durable flashlight showing signs of intense use. By twisting the back for a few seconds, the power flow is reversed and stored in internal cells of the flashlight. It is an essential tool for exploration for extended periods of time. Unfortunately, it cannot be used along most of the weaponry since it requires a free hand. Thus is can be simultaneously used only with pistols and other single-handed equipment.

Broken pocket signal light in a scratched metal case, painted in black. Presumably it has been unchanged for a long period from the fifties to the nineties of the twentieth century. Designed for military use, powered by a battery size 3336L, has a lock inside the body to store a spare lamp. It is equipped with a device for fastening to the belt, a push button switch, a slide lock for the latter, and two filters (red and green) built into the front cover, which are guided by means of levers to the glass for the output of the light flux.

Highly popular in the Zone and widely available most probably owing to an outside connection of one of the traders. Small aluminum case containing cocaine and the tools facilitating use. Cocaine is a powerful nervous system stimulant. Its effects can last from 15-30 minutes to an hour, depending on the route of administration. Cocaine increases alertness, induces feelings of well-being, competence and sexuality. Anxiety, paranoia and restlessness are common side effects. With excessive dosage, tremors, convulsions and increased body temperature are observed. Bandits are known for sniffing this drug right before launching an assault or ambush.

A tarpaulin (or hootch) is a large sheet of strong, flexible, water-resistant or waterproof material, often cloth such as canvas or polyester coated with urethane, or made of plastics such as polyethylene. It has reinforced grommets at the corners and along the sides to form attachment points for rope, allowing them to be tied down or suspended. Serves many purposes, but is mainly used to create small and simple tent-like hideouts. Trading value is low due to easily found alternatives.

Epinephrine (also known as adrenalin) is a hormone and a neurotransmitter. Epinephrine has many functions in the body, instantly regulating heart rate, blood vessel and air passage diameters, and metabolic shifts. Epinephrine release is a crucial component of the fight-or-flight response of the sympathetic nervous system. The effects lead to increased blood glucose and fatty acids, providing substrates for instant energy production within cells throughout the body.

It’s not safe to sleep here!

Being caught by surprise in the Zone is one of the worst things that can happen to you. Although the QR-system does not help you prevent such situations, it certainly helps with getting out of danger. Its function is simple: it almost immediately removes the straps from your backpack and lets you escape to a safe place without the heavy backpack hampering your movement. To use it, set it as a hotkey item. Push the hotkey to activate the emergency release that instantly drops your backpack (and everything inside it) to the ground. Your equipped weapon(s), ammunition, armor and armor attachments as well as UPD remain in your possession, so you are ready to fight. You can retrieve your backpack afterwards.

An iron ampoule designed as field equipment for military field personnel for instant pain reduction. This ampoule contains a powerful dose of morphine. In clinical medicine, morphine is regarded as the gold standard of opioid analgesics used to relieve severe or agonizing pain and suffering. Like other opioids, such as oxycodone, hydromorphone, and diacetylmorphine (heroin), morphine acts directly on the central nervous system (CNS) to relieve pain. Injected into an arm or a thigh.

An iron ampoule designed as field equipment for military field personnel for instant pain reduction. It contains a powerful dose of metamizole mixed with an antihemorrhagic drug. Metamizole is one of the strongest Non-Steroidal Anti-Inflammatory Drugs (NSAIDs), especially effective at easing aches and pains as well as reducing fevers. It is also useful as anti-inflammatory drug when used in higher doses. May cause some delayed side effects such as leucopenia or agranulocytosis, so it should be used with moderation. Injected into an arm or a thigh. Its availability in the Zone is limited due to the difficulty of smuggling the medicine across military cordons.

Cold War era power unit about the size of a small walkie talkie. Accepts almost any type of batteries. Utilizes every bit of energy from inserted batteries and supplies electronic devices with power in an enhanced stream through a set of micro wires. These can be connected to any piece of equipment, regardless of its complexity or age. Allows stalkers to use and handle numerous electronic devices even if they have only one battery.

The Meal, Ready-to-Eat (commonly known as the MRE) is a self-contained, individual field ration in lightweight packaging, developed by the United States military for its service members for use in combat or other field conditions where organized food facilities are not available. One MRE can be used as one meal. The packaging of an MRE is designed to withstand rough conditions and exposure to the elements. Contains one course along with a variety of other food and drink items. While it can be eaten cold, it usually tastes much better when heated up with the included flameless ration heater (FRH, a water-activated exothermic reaction device that emits heat).

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military ration

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] clean nutrition source
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 3 portions in one package. 1398 kcal in total

Breakfast, dinner and supper all in one package. Includes various food items whose function is to provide the body with all minerals and micro-elements essential for your health as well as cooking equipment (small metal frame, fuel tablets, matches, striker) and other items (e.g. napkins) facilitating use in field conditions. Comes with a polymeric box that protects the ingredients from hazardous environmental conditions. The polymeric box has 3 sections, each respectively for breakfast, dinner and supper.

This Ukrainian combat ration is based on a previous Russian version, and comprises commercially available cans and dried food items packed together in a sectioned box (resembling a takeout tray) made of very thin green plastic. Contains all that is necessary to provide a healthy adult with all calories and minerals needed during a single day.

PFM-1 (short for ïðîòèâîïåõîòíàÿ ôóãàñíàÿ ìèíà; NATO name: “Green parrot") used to be a standard-issue anti-personnel mine of the Red Army, employed mainly during the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan. Its widespread utilization during the conflict led to high civilian casualties, especially among children, since randomly scattered mines were often mistaken for toys due to their familiar shape and color. For this reason, the PFM-1 earned a sinister nickname: “Child killer.” Since then, the mine has been replaced by newer models. However, as was the case with a variety of other “retired” weaponry, a large number of these mines has somehow made its way into the Zone, becoming its primary booby-trap explosive. The mine is highly valued mainly for its functionality, user-friendliness, compact size and low weight, while its main drawback is a relatively small amount of explosive material: its power is often insufficient to kill a heavily armored stalker with a single blast. For this reason, the mine should be used in combination with other explosive materials and it acts as an igniter. If it is not armed, the mine will not detonate, even when hit with a gun.

Improvised explosive device based on OG-7V warhead and parts of a car battery. It looks like it has been carried around for quite some time and could go off any second. Fortunately, the triggering mechanism ensures that it won’t unless the explosive is directly hit by a bullet or subjected to other potent physical force. In the Zone, IEDs are quite popular and Zoners use them for a variety of purposes, from gaining access to closed areas to ambushes. They are also often placed next to mines to greatly amplify the power of explosion. IED can be effectively concealed making it virtually invisible to everyone else.

Improvised explosive device produced from various chemical substances, with a broken electrical igniter and in steel ball container. Chemicals used in the device produce intense odor and are heavily toxic. This IED is significantly more powerful than a more common OG-7V version. In the Zone, IEDs are quite popular and Zoners use them for a variety of purposes, from gaining access to closed areas to ambushes. They are also often placed next to mines to greatly amplify the explosion’s power. IED can be effectively concealed making it virtually invisible to everyone else.

%c[0,170,170,170]Heavy metal gas balloon impregnated with compatible polymer on the inside and on the outside with Hypalon for weather abrasion and UV resistance. This gas holder balloon is a collapsible, intermediated storage tank for any industrial gas, prior to bottling under pressure. In the Zone such canisters most often contain a composition of methane, propane, ethane and butane, and can be used for cooking or heating as well as for combat purposes. Upon direct gunfire, the canister may ignite and after a short while a rapid release of a considerable amount of energy may follow, causing the gas in the balloon to expand instantly and resulting in a delayed but powerful explosion with metal shrapnels going in every direction. Such canisters have been utilized as a weapon in the feuds between factions in the Zone killing many and crippling even more. If emptied, the balloon can be utilized for armor repairs.

%c[0,170,170,170]Heavy metal gas balloon impregnated with compatible polymer on the inside and on the outside with Hypalon for weather abrasion and UV resistance. This gas holder balloon is a collapsible, intermediated storage tank for any industrial gas, prior to bottling under pressure. In the Zone such canisters most often contain a composition of methane, propane, ethane and butane, and can be used for cooking or heating as well as for combat purposes. Upon direct gunfire, the canister may ignite and after a short while a rapid release of a considerable amount of energy may follow, causing the gas in the balloon to expand instantly and resulting in a delayed but powerful explosion with metal shrapnels going in every direction. Such canisters have been utilized as a weapon in the feuds between factions in the Zone killing many and crippling even more. If emptied, the balloon can be utilized for armor repairs.

%c[0,170,170,170]A small and moderately heavy metal can filled with a mixture of explosive industrial chemicals, metal bolts and nuts as well as black gunpowder retrieved from old ammunition. A notorious death trap designed by a group of Russian bandits known as “the Swireksters” and sold to various bandit groups operating in Zaton and Jupiter. Upon direct gunfire, the can will instantly explode with metal bolts and corrosive chemicals bursting in every direction. No one in their right mind should drop their guard when planning to make use of this deadly weapon. You can also use the metal parts of the can for emergency maintenance of outfits.

%c[0,170,170,170]A large metal can filled with E95 gasoline. Jerrycans were brought to the Zone in large quantities by the Ukrainian military for their armored vehicles. Initially, they served their purpose, but after the second Chernobyl Disaster vehicles for reasons still unknown were no longer operational. While some Zoners are still trying to make the wrecks work again, others have found alternate ways of utilizing the jerrycans, namely, as improvised explosives. Upon direct hit, the canister will catch fire and explode after a slight delay. Although heavy and cumbersome, it is extremely powerful, and a well-placed jerrycan can be lethal even if the target wears the heaviest of body armors. On the other hand, the explosion is often so potent that the killer becomes the victim himself, so it’s best to use these canisters with caution. There are rumors that a veteran stalker named Yuya once saved his skin by luring a pseudogiant into a jerrycan trap. He emptied his last Makarov magazine and the giant burst into flames with a roar that was heard throughout the Jupiter.

%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] explosive
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[255,238,153,26] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for:%c[0,170,170,170] outfit repairs (+2%)

This compact foldable oven is intended for cooking single entree meals with dry wood. However, since wood found within the Zone is far too contaminated to be used for that purpose, stalkers rely on imported charcoal as the cheapest and most widely available burnable material. The stove can produce temperatures sufficient to grill less poisoned mutant meat, but preparing more toxic meat requires the utilization of more advanced equipment. Basic fire skills are needed. Made of stainless steel and ultralight titanium.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]NOTES:
%c[0,170,170,170]Although charcoal is available in the Zone at relatively cheap prices, you need to use a significant amount of it in order to prepare a single meal. For this reason, charcoal is not as cost effective as it would seem. On the other hand, it is relatively light, which makes it perfect for longer trips deep in the Zone.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Mutant meats that do not require high temperature to be prepared are referred to as “low-tier,” whereas those that require high temperature are known as “high-tier.”
 
%c[0,140,140,140]PROPERTIES:
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] low-tier field cooking equipment
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] fuel:%c[0,170,170,170] charcoal
%c[0,0,255,30] • %c[0,140,140,140] usable for cooking meats of lesser mutants

The stove has been tested extensively over many years and has been used on countless expeditions. It is extremely robust, reliable and powerful and was designed to handle demanding situations, extreme altitudes and both low and high temperatures. It has a very high output and can be used with virtually any kind of fuel, including butane, gasoline / petrol, diesel, kerosene / paraffin, and even aviation fuel. Using the separate control knob, you can adjust the flame to the heat you want, even if you are wearing gloves.
 
%c[0,210,210,210]NOTES:
%c[0,170,170,170]Since fuels used in the multi-fuel stove are much more efficient energy-carriers than the wood or coal, the multi-fuel stove is - in the long run - significantly more cost-effective than traditional wood or coal stoves. On the other hand, these fuels are usually carried in heavy metal containers, which makes them more suited for use at bases, rather than in field operations.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Mutant meats that do not require high temperature to be prepared are referred to as “low-tier,” whereas those that require high temperature are known as “high-tier.”

That being said, finding an original fully-functional glowstick will be difficult due to the presence of many cheap, fake copies.
